name: NavigationMenuViewport
description: Complete viewport combining portal, positioner, popup, and viewport primitive. Renders a `<div>` element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: popupElement
props.description: Custom popup element for content container

props.name: portalElement
props.description: Custom portal element for rendering content

props.name: positionerElement
props.description: Custom positioner element for popup positioning
